text: Entry groups - expand outward. Groups can have custom names and colors. Group manager window allows you to move entries from group to group. (This would be really helpful for the to-do list. Groups could include Settings, Entry: Debug, Font, Color schemes, Search/filter, Export, Prompts (for journaling), Build/Install). Groups can sort their entries as ordered or unordered lists.
Entries with countdown dates and times
tk messagebox for giving the user feedback
Shawn's idea - journal prompts. Save them to JSON and then add the ability to make custom prompts in the Settings menu.
Put settings in a canvas with a scrollbar so that it can be scrollable
If default color scheme not found, display a message asking the user to pick a color scheme from the dropdown menu.
Allow custom fonts, in addition to the default Tkinter ones
Objects that need to refresh colors: insert prompt, file browser, and name window within file browser
Fix checked entries going to bottom
Settings: Show/hide date, time, menu buttons
Settings: add font sizes and families
